full_output.summary: A dedicated and an aspiring Software Development Engineer with an objective of working in an organization that provides opportunities for technical and personal advancement

projects.name: Super Store Sales Board
projects.description: Identified critical KPIs such as total sales, sales growth rate, and average order value, providing actionable insights for business strategy. Pinpointed top-performing products, seasonal sales trends, and customer purchasing behavior. Utilized Excel and Power BI for data visualization and dashboard creation, highlighting sales trends and customer behavior.

projects.name: Insights Automation
projects.description: Developed a shell script on an AWS EC2 instance to automate the auditing of user access for a GitHub organization, focusing on visibility and operational efficiency. Implemented scripts to check repository collaborators and identify users with elevated permissions using GitHub API. Developed a Bash script to list and verify GitHub organization members and their roles.

experiences.description: Developed and implemented machine learning model to detect fraudulent credit card transactions.
Gained hands-on experience with Python modules including Pandas, NumPy for data manipulation and analyzing. Utilized Matplotlib and Seaborn to create insightful visualizations.

full_output.name: Polina Harika Harika
achievements_and_awards: Finalist in DataVista Business Analytics Competition Advanced to the final round of DataVista, organized by 'D-Insights: The MIS and Analytics Club' -kolkata
